ns2:sqlResource.query: SELECT service.service_id, service.cp_id, service.cp_service_name, cp.cp_name, service.cp_activate_url, service.cp_deact_url, service.cp_bill_response_url, service.wind_site_id, service.wind_mt_format, service.wind_mt_udh, service.wind_mt_reqsource, service.wind_mt_source, service.wind_caring_service_type, service.wind_deact_service_type, service.tim_service_name, service.status_id, service.creation_date, service.last_modify_date FROM service left outer join cp on service.cp_id = cp.cp_id
